title: Bioengineering of one dimensional hierarchical Cu7S4 hollow nanotubes for non-enzymatic glucose sensing applications
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,27122-27131
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA05199H, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Giday G. Welegergs, Abera D. Ambaye, Mbulelo Jokazi, Nnamdi Nwahara, Tebello Nyokong
Herein, a novel and eco-friendly green chemistry approach has been devised at room temperature for synthesis of 1D hierarchical Cu7S4 hollow nanotubes via volatile organosulfur compounds from Allium sativum L for non-enzymatic glucose detection.
